title: Job Openings at Brands Optimal Limited
content:
Brands Optimal Limited is one of Africa’s leading Experiential Marketing Agency which optimizes value for client through the use of strategic, reliable and measurable method in consumer engagement, loyalty seeding and sales generation.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Admin Assistant / Intern (Corps Member)

Job Location:  Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Experiential Marketing

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We’re seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Corp Member to provide administrative support to our team.
	Core Function: Provide administrative, clerical, and operational support to the HR/Admin team, ensuring efficient record-keeping documentation.


Responsibilities


	Vet salary schedules including account details for contract staff, ensuring compliance with company policies and procedures.
	Vet offer letters for contract staff, ensuring compliance with company policies and procedures.
	Manage and maintain accurate records and databases
	Maintain organized filing systems, both physical and digital
	Provide administrative support.
	Carry out clerical tasks required in the department and any other tasks assigned by the Head of Department.


Requirements and Skills


	B.Sc. or HND in Administration, Accounting or related fields
	Candidate must hold a 2:1 degree or higher.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel is an added advantage.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunities for career development and training
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.


Application Closing Date: 31st December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Resume to: jobs@brandsoptimal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Warehouse Assistant

Job Location: Opic - Isheri North, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently seeking a reliable and hardworking Warehouse Assistant to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will support day-to-day operations in the warehouse, including receiving, storing, and dispatching goods efficiently and accurately.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive and process incoming stock and materials.
	Pick and fill orders from stock.
	Organize and maintain inventory and storage areas.
	Perform inventory controls and keep quality standards high.
	Assist in regular stocktaking and cycle counts.
	Keep the warehouse clean, organized, and safe at all times.
	Maintain the security of assets in the warehouse.


Requirements


	Minimum of an OND or equivalent qualification.
	Prior experience in warehouse operations is an added advantage.
	Basic knowledge of inventory software, databases, and systems.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
	Must be reliable, punctual, and a good team player.
	Candidates residing in or around OPIC, Isheri North, Berger, Warewa, or other nearby areas will be given priority, due to proximity to the warehouse.
	preferred candidate should be able to resume immediately.


Remuneration
Attractive and based on experience.

Application Closing Date: 31st December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Resume to: jobs@brandsoptimal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email

 

 

3.) Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Sort, organize, and maintain electronic and physical files in accordance with company policies.
	Ensure all documents are accurately labeled and retrievable.
	Cross-check information against existing records to ensure consistency.
	Input and update relevant data into internal systems, maintain data integrity and accuracy.
	Perform general office duties and any other tasks assigned by the Head of Department.


Application Closing Date: 30th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@brandsoptimal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Electrical Engineer - Apapa Port Terminal",
  "description": "Dangote Group is one of Nigeria&rsquo;s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard &ndash; earned reputation for excellent business practices and products&rsquo; quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Electrical Engineer&nbsp;- Apapa Port Terminal

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibese, Ogun

Job Summary &nbsp; &nbsp;


	Executing the maintenance, implementing or improving the electrical equipment facilities components equipment products or systems for industrial, commercial or domestic purposes.


Key Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Performing a wide range of engineering tasks by operating computer-assisted design or engineering software and equipment.
	Conferring with other department, and others to discuss existing or potential engineering products or projects.
	Ensuring that installation and operations conform to standards and customer requirements by Establishing manufacturing, or installation standards or specifications by performing a wide range of detailed calculations.
	Ensuring compliance with specifications, codes, or customer requirements by directing or coordinating installation, manufacturing, maintenance, documentation, support, or testing activities.
	Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies.
	Preparing specifications for purchases of electrical equipment and materials.
	Supervising or training project team members.
	Maintaining electrical equipment, panels, motors etc.
	Working with a variety of technicians.
	Knowledge in Electrical standards
	Following and implementing SOPs, SWPs and OJTs.
	Preparing, Following the ISO documents in systematic manner.


Key Requirements


	HND / BSc in Electrical Engineering
	2 - 9 of post-qualification experience in a manufacturing/industrial environment in large electrical machineries installation.
	Excellent knowledge of cement products and cement manufacturing processes&nbsp;
	Expert knowledge of maintenance management methods, of predictive inspection tools and of CMMS (Computer Maintenance Management System),
	Extensive knowledge electrical engineering and maintenance practices.
	Good knowledge of safety legislation and rules
	Good knowledge of ISO 9000 standards and TPM
	Good oral and written communication skills
	Organizational Awareness
	Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills
	Innovation &amp; Creativity.

Electrical Engineer - Apapa Port Terminal Job at Dangote Group




        
    

        
        Dangote Group is one of Nigeria’s most diversified business conglomerates with a hard – earned reputation for excellent business practices and products’ quality with its operational headquarters in the bustling metropolis of Lagos, Nigeria in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer - Apapa Port Terminal

Job Location: Ibese, Ogun

Job Summary    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Executing the maintenance, implementing or improving the electrical equipment facilities components equipment products or systems for industrial, commercial or domestic purposes.


Key Duties & Responsibilities


	Performing a wide range of engineering tasks by operating computer-assisted design or engineering software and equipment.
	Conferring with other department, and others to discuss existing or potential engineering products or projects.
	Ensuring that installation and operations conform to standards and customer requirements by Establishing manufacturing, or installation standards or specifications by performing a wide range of detailed calculations.
	Ensuring compliance with specifications, codes, or customer requirements by directing or coordinating installation, manufacturing, maintenance, documentation, support, or testing activities.
	Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies.
	Preparing specifications for purchases of electrical equipment and materials.
	Supervising or training project team members.
	Maintaining electrical equipment, panels, motors etc.
	Working with a variety of technicians.
	Knowledge in Electrical standards
	Following and implementing SOPs, SWPs and OJTs.
	Preparing, Following the ISO documents in systematic manner.


Key Requirements


	HND / BSc in Electrical Engineering
	2 - 9 of post-qualification experience in a manufacturing/industrial environment in large electrical machineries installation.
	Excellent knowledge of cement products and cement manufacturing processes 
	Expert knowledge of maintenance management methods, of predictive inspection tools and of CMMS (Computer Maintenance Management System),
	Extensive knowledge electrical engineering and maintenance practices.
	Good knowledge of safety legislation and rules
	Good knowledge of ISO 9000 standards and TPM
	Good oral and written communication skills
	Organizational Awareness
	Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills
	Innovation & Creativity.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Admin / Social Media Manager",
  "description": "Wiz Consults - Our client, Digifted Studios, is recruiting highly organized and creative candidates&nbsp;to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin / Social Media Manager&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Support the Business Development Officer in sourcing and identifying potential clients via social media channels
	Grow the company&#39;s followers across social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, etc.)
	Create and schedule engaging content to enhance brand presence
	Provide administrative support to the team
	Monitor and report on social media metrics and performance.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Support in identifying potential clients via social media channels
	Studio booking and utilization via social channels
	Month-on-month growth in followers across social media platforms
	Increased engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares, etc.)


Requirements


	1-2 years of experience in social media management or business development support
	Excellent communication and organizational skills
	Proficiency in social media platforms and content creation
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to:&nbsp;careers@digiftedhub.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;If you&#39;re a social media-savvy and organized individual who loves creativity and business growth, we&#39;d love to hear from you!",

Admin / Social Media Manager Job at Wiz Consults




        
    

        
        Wiz Consults - Our client, Digifted Studios, is recruiting highly organized and creative candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin / Social Media Manager 

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Support the Business Development Officer in sourcing and identifying potential clients via social media channels
	Grow the company's followers across social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, etc.)
	Create and schedule engaging content to enhance brand presence
	Provide administrative support to the team
	Monitor and report on social media metrics and performance.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Support in identifying potential clients via social media channels
	Studio booking and utilization via social channels
	Month-on-month growth in followers across social media platforms
	Increased engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares, etc.)


Requirements


	1-2 years of experience in social media management or business development support
	Excellent communication and organizational skills
	Proficiency in social media platforms and content creation
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: careers@digiftedhub.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: If you're a social media-savvy and organized individual who loves creativity and business growth, we'd love to hear from you!    

    

        Click here to Apply
